Trustee_4.name: Sofia Hernandez
Trustee_4.content: My reputation as a trustee has been significantly enhanced through my fair and responsible behavior during the investment process. By proposing a generous allocation plan that prioritized the investor's share at 70%, I exemplified trustworthiness and pro-sociality, fostering mutual benefit. The successful investment outcome and adherence to the distribution plan further solidified my reliability and competence, thus reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and effective trustee.

Investor_15.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15.content: Ahmed Hassan's behavior during this investment process has positively shaped his reputation. By willingly providing resources and accepting the proposed allocation plan, he demonstrated his commitment to equitable outcomes and collaboration. Although previously unestablished, this transaction lays a strong foundation for future interactions based on trust and mutual respect, suggesting he is pro-social and open to cooperative behavior.
